Performer:
Nozawa Katsushi (see also Toyozawa Tomisuke V) (野澤勝司)

Alternate Name: Toyozawa Tomisuke V (豊沢富助 (五))

Dates: '1971-1984/04'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
